title: Meaning, origin and history of the name Armando - Behind the Name
text: Gender Masculine Usage Spanish, Italian, Portuguese Pronounced Pron. /aɾ.ˈman.do/(Spanish) /ar.ˈman.do/(Italian) /ɐɾ.ˈmɐ̃.du/(European Portuguese) /aʁ.ˈmɐ̃.du/(Portuguese) [key·simplify] Meaning & History Spanish, Italian and Portuguese form of Herman.
